Fleet of Foot.name: Fleet of Foot
Fleet of Foot.blurb: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.
Fleet of Foot.description: Innate: Sivir gains  30 − 50 (based on level) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds when she damages an enemy champion with an ability or a basic attack.
Fleet of Foot.notes: * Fleet of Foot is not triggered by Summoner spells or items.

Boomerang Blade.name: Boomerang Blade
Boomerang Blade.blurb: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
Boomerang Blade.description: Active: Sivir hurls her crossblade in the target direction. Enemies in its path take  physical damage, reduced to 100% − 40% (based on non-champions hit). Upon reaching maximum range the crossblade returns to her, dealing the same damage.
Boomerang Blade.description2: Each unit can be damaged only once per pass.
Boomerang Blade.notes:
* The damage reduction per unit hit does not reset back to full damage upon changing direction.
 Boomerang Blade will still return to Sivir even if she dies before it changes direction.

Ricochet.name: Ricochet
Ricochet.blurb: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
Ricochet.description: Active: Sivir's next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds bounce to nearby unaffected units, dealing them physical damage, until none remain in range.
Ricochet.leveling:
Bounce Damage:
30 / 40 / 50 / 60 / 70% AD
Total Bounce Damage:
90 / 120 / 150 / 180 / 210% AD
Ricochet.description2: If Sivir  critically strikes her target, the bounces do so as well.
Ricochet.notes:
* Ricochet-enhanced basic attacks can bounce from structures onto secondary targets but not from nearby units onto structures.
 Potential targets do NOT need to be  visible to Sivir for Ricochet to bounce to them.
 Attacks on Sivir's primary target will apply other on-hit effects as normal but secondary targets will not be affected by any at all.
 On-hit effects on the primary target will not modify damage dealt to secondary ones.

 Since  The Black Cleaver's armor reduction is not an on-hit effect Ricochet will apply it on each secondary target.
 Ricochet doesn't apply Dark Harvest on non-primary targets.

Spell Shield.name: Spell Shield
Spell Shield.blurb: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.
Spell Shield.description: Active: After a brief delay, Sivir gains a  spell shield for 1.5 seconds.
Spell Shield.description2: If Sivir blocks an ability with this shield, she restores  mana.
Spell Shield.notes:
* Spell Shield can block a  Dragon auto attack thus preventing the damage and giving Sivir mana.
 The initial knockup when  Dragon is first damaged cannot be blocked.

 Even if Spell Shield blocks the first hit of a  Cosmic Binding, it will not block the stun after hitting the secondary target.
 It will not block the damage of  Sleepy Trouble Bubble while on the ground, but it will block the drowsy debuff.

On the Hunt.name: On the Hunt
On the Hunt.blurb: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
On the Hunt.description: Passive: Sivir gains  bonus attack speed while  Ricochet is active.
On the Hunt.description2: Active: Sivir rallies all nearby allies for 8 seconds, granting them and herself  bonus movement speed that decays to 20% after a few seconds.
On the Hunt.leveling2:
Initial Movement Speed:
40 / 50 / 60%
Initial Movement Speed Duration:
2 / 3 / 4
On the Hunt.notes:
* On the Hunt's active will also affect minions.
 Allies who weren't in range when On the Hunt was cast can still gain the bonus movement speed by approaching Sivir.
 The bonus will persist for the full duration even if affected allies leave Sivir's aura range.
